msg: changes related to move from hbase-0.20 to 0.21 (trunk)
* added setup/copy-hdfs-jars-to-maven.sh to install our internal HDFS jar to
maven local repo so that HBase builds can see it.
* updated pom.xml to pick up our internal HDFS jars
* updated install-hbase.sh scripts to work with trunk
* Fix for an error in saveVersion.sh (this was happening because our path
I will update the wiki with build/install instructions shortly.
* running unit tests using "mvn test". (Our manual mode tests in "manual" are
getting picked up by org/apache/hadoop/hbase/manual are also getting picked up
by mvn. So these tests are failing. Will separately work on suppressing those).
